textAfterTable: Films & Schedules - UKRAINE Tue, Feb 19, 2013 at 6 PM (Cinema 21) Buy Tickets Sat, Feb 23, 2013 at 6 PM (Whitsell Auditorium) Buy Tickets IN THE FOG DIRECTOR: Sergei Loznitsa - UKRAINE Adapted from the novel by Vasili Bykov, Loznitsa’s film is a sobering meditation on the complicated moral decisions faced by both soldiers and citizens during wartime. Set in Nazi-occupied Belarus, the story begins with the hanging of three villagers for conspiring against their German oppressors. Later, Sushenya—a man spared by the Germans—is visited by two resistance fighters who intend to execute him for presumed collaboration with the Nazis. But their plan is interrupted by enemy fire and all three men become unwilling companions on an evasive trek through the forest. Through flashbacks, Loznitsa closely examines how each of the men...
